Title: Log Entries Include Success Or Failure Indication
DirectLink: Log Entries Include Success Or Failure Indication

Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 10.3.4

What to Check For

Log entries should include success or failure indication.

How to Check

Examine the logs to verify that log entries include success or failure indication.

How to Fix

Please refer to the vendor's documentation or technical support for instructions on how to change the log output settings.

Related Items

  • Implement Audit Trails for System Components
